com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither

Class AbstractDitherer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither.AbstractDitherer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ditherer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtkinsonDitherer, BurkesDitherer, FloydSteinbergDitherer, JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherer, NullDitherer, SierraDitherer, SierraLiteDitherer, SierraTwoDitherer, StuckiDitherer

    public abstract class AbstractDitherer
extends Object
implements Ditherer
    Abstract base class for implementers of Ditherer that operate on 24-bit, true color ARGB images.

    • Method Detail

      • ditherPixel

        public abstract void ditherPixel(int x,
                                 int y,
                                 double qer,
                                 double qeg,
                                 double qeb)
        Dithers a given quantization error for a specified pixel.

        Most implementations of this method should distribute error by invoking distributeError(int, int, double, double, double, double) one or more times.

        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the pixel to dither
        y - The y-coordinate of the pixel to dither
        qer - The quantization error in the red color channel
        qeg - The quantization error in the green color channel
        qeb - The quantization error in the blue color channel

      • dither

        public BufferedImage dither(BufferedImage source,
                            QuantizationFunction quantizer)
        Applies a QuantizationFunction to each pixel in the source image and dithers (diffuses) the quantization error.
        Specified by:
        dither in interface Ditherer
        Parameters:
        source - The source image to be quantized and dithered; unmodified by this operation.
        quantizer - The quantization function to use.
        Returns:
        A copy of the source image with the quantization/dithering function applied.

      • getColorCount

        public int getColorCount(BufferedImage image)
        Determines the number of unique colors appearing in the given image.
        Parameters:
        image - The image whose colors should be counted.
        Returns:
        The number of unique colors in the given image.

      • distributeError

        protected void distributeError(int x,
                               int y,
                               double qer,
                               double qeg,
                               double qeb,
                               double fraction)
        Distributes a fraction of the quantization error to another pixel in the raster. Distribution of quantization error adds (fraction * error) to the pixel's existing color channel values.

        Has no effect if the specified pixel is not in the bounds of the current image.

        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the pixel receiving the distributed quantization error
        y - The y-coordinate of the pixel receiving the distributed quantization error
        qer - The red channel quantization error
        qeg - The green channel quantization error
        qeb - The blue channel quantization error
        fraction - The fraction of each channel's error to be distributed to this pixel.
